'''Wind Charged''' is a [[status effect]] that causes an [[entity]] to release a [[Wind Charge|burst of wind]] upon death.

== Effect ==
Wind Charged causes any [[entities]] that have the effect to emit a burst of wind, similar to that caused by a thrown [[wind charge]], in at the center{{verify|edition=bedrock}} of the entity's [[hitbox]] upon its death. Mobs affected by Wind Charged emit wind-like [[particles]].

== Immune mobs ==
*[[Wither]] and [[ender dragon]] are immune to Wind Charged.
*[[Creaking]]s that spawn from [[creaking heart]] are unaffected by Wind charged.
